tasks.title: Set up Spotify for Artists account
Set up an Apple Music for Artists account
Claim the YouTube Music artist profile
Set up the Amuse.io distribution account
Set up a Bandcamp artist profile
Register with Teosto
tasks.body: STIM equivalent in Finland. Required for royalty collection.

tasks.title: Set up an Instagram artist profile
Set up a Facebook artist page
Set up email capture on the website
Create a SoundCloud account for previews
Create master licensing target list
tasks.body: 30+ opportunities. Research wellness podcasts, YouTube channels, and game devs. Update quarterly.

tasks.title: Research Finnish grant opportunities
tasks.body: Taike, KONE. Annual or bi-annual activity.

tasks.title: Create project brief for this release
tasks.body: Album name, track count, release date, artistic goals, target audience

tasks.title: Copy the master roadmap into the release-specific project
Set release date
tasks.body: Minimum 4 weeks out for playlist pitching. Consider seasonal timing.

tasks.title: Define success metrics for this release
tasks.body: Streams goal, playlist adds, revenue target, licensing placements

tasks.title: Define revenue strategy for this release
tasks.body: Which income streams are you activating? Bandcamp? Licensing targets?

tasks.title: Record/produce all tracks
tasks.body: Follow Piano Production Checklist or Electronic Production Checklist

tasks.title: Loudness check
tasks.body: LUFS targets: -14 to -16 LUFS. Use Youlean or similar.

tasks.title: Create a backup of all project files
Identify 2-3 key tracks to promote
tasks.body: For albums - don't promote every track equally

tasks.title: Take or gather promo photos (optional)
tasks.body: Only if naturally available (e.g., performance photos)

tasks.title: Complete metadata in Amuse.io
tasks.body: Track titles, album name, genre tags, release date

tasks.title: Write album description with CC BY 4.0 statement
Generate pre-save link via Amuse.io
tasks.body: Use this in all pre-release promotion

tasks.title: Verify distribution to all platforms
tasks.body: Check Spotify, Apple Music, YouTube Music. 24-48 hours after upload.

tasks.title: Update brylie.music homepage
tasks.body: Feature upcoming release with pre-save link

tasks.title: Generate 5-7 social media posts for release
Create 3-5 short clips from recent livestream
Post announcement on Instagram with pre-save link
Update brylie.music with release info
tasks.body: May already be done in Phase 5

tasks.title: Mention upcoming release at next eldercare performance
Pitch to Spotify Editorial Playlists
tasks.body: At least 1 week before release. Via Spotify for Artists dashboard.

tasks.title: Research independent ambient/piano playlists
tasks.body: 10-15 targets. Use Licensing Outreach skill or Spotify search.

tasks.title: Pitch to wellness/meditation playlists
tasks.body: Your music is perfect for this niche

tasks.title: Begin outreach to licensing targets
tasks.body: Podcasters, YouTubers, wellness apps, game devs

tasks.title: Research + pitch to Creative Commons-friendly curators
tasks.body: Your licensing is an advantage here

tasks.title: Share snippet or preview track on Instagram/SoundCloud
Optional: Instagram Story with countdown sticker
Optional: Livestream discussing upcoming release
tasks.body: Announce briefly during the regular creative stream

tasks.title: Remind followers about pre-save (1 week before release)
Engage with 3-5 similar artists on Instagram
Post It's live! announcement on Instagram
Update Spotify Artist Pick
tasks.body: Feature new release in Spotify for Artists

tasks.title: Upload full album video to YouTube
tasks.body: Optimize title, description with CC BY 4.0 statement, tags

tasks.title: Create artist playlist on Spotify featuring new release + influences
tasks.body: Include Nils Frahm, Max Richter, your tracks

tasks.title: Share thank you post celebrating release
Respond to ALL comments on release posts
Optional: Instagram Story with Questions sticker
Continue pitching to independent playlists
tasks.body: Now that track is live, some curators prefer this

tasks.title: Follow up with licensing targets who haven't responded
Thank playlist curators who added your music
tasks.body: Personal messages, share their playlist on your Story

tasks.title: Share any playlist additions on Instagram Story
Check Spotify for Artists for engagement data
tasks.body: Which tracks resonating? Where are listeners?

tasks.title: Post about any milestones
tasks.body: Playlist adds, stream count. Celebrate wins, even small ones.

tasks.title: Create making of or inspiration post
Share performance clips if you played tracks live
tasks.body: Performed at eldercare or other venue

tasks.title: Optional: Livestream playing through album or discussing creation
Engage with other ambient/piano artists
tasks.body: 5-10 meaningful interactions. Thoughtful comments, not self-promotion.

tasks.title: Continue responding to any new comments/messages
Follow up with licensing targets (second follow-up)
tasks.body: Only if they showed interest initially

tasks.title: Pitch to additional niche playlists or opportunities
Request Release Performance Report from Metrics Analyst
tasks.body: Let Metrics Analyst skill compile the data

tasks.title: Review streaming analytics
tasks.body: Spotify, Apple, YouTube. Which tracks resonated? Geographic distribution?

tasks.title: Document successful playlist additions
tasks.body: Track which curators added you - nurture these relationships

tasks.title: Analyze which social posts got most engagement
Document what worked vs what didn't
Identify adjustments for next release
tasks.body: What to do more of? Less of? Differently?

tasks.title: Celebrate progress and wins
tasks.body: Reflect on growth, not just metrics

tasks.title: Review overall metrics (Monthly)
tasks.body: Metrics Analyst monthly report. First week of each month.

tasks.title: Engage with ambient music communities
tasks.body: Reddit, etc. Thoughtful participation, not promotion.

tasks.title: Maintain relationships with playlist curators
tasks.body: Comment on their playlists, share updates

tasks.title: Review and update artist bios across platforms
Reach out to 1-2 artists about potential collaboration
Update GitHub Projects master roadmap
tasks.body: Based on learnings from recent releases

tasks.title: Research and apply to Finnish grants
Comprehensive year-in-review
tasks.body: All metrics, revenue, growth, lessons learned

tasks.title: Update Goals & Success Metrics document
tasks.body: Based on actual performance vs goals
